values: So it has been over 5 years since I have posted in this thing. I feel like I am different person from 5 years ago and Im not sure how I feel about it. Alot has happened and I feel like I dont have anyone to talk to about these things, I dont feel like anyone would truly understand my feelings, thats why I have to write this. Things have been crazy lately and its still hard to comprehend what has happened. I have never felt more betrayed or hurt in my entire life. No one has ever hurt me this way and Im not sure how to deal with it. Somedays I dont even want to get out of bed, I dont want to remember anything or think about it, yet its ALL I think about, every day.....hoping it was a mistake, wishing it was a dream. I just feel numb...numb to happiness, numb to the life going on around me. I thought I had this part of my life figured out, I was happy knowing that I knew who I wanted to spend the rest of my life with, but it just goes to show that nothing is promised, definatly not love. I know I have bitched and griped about love throughout this journal, but I can honestly say that this time its different. This time it goes deeper, to a place that has never been touched before. I dont hate him, I just hate what he did to me. He destroyed me. How can I ever let anyone get close again? How am I ever supposed to be the same? How do I move on? I just have so much anger towards him, im just SO angry. It has only been about 2 months, but I am SICK of feeling this way, SICK of thinking about him, SICK of crying, SICK of remembering what we had, SICK of thinking about him in some way everytime someone mentions something that reminds me of him, SICK of feeling numb. How could he do this to me? How do you do this to someone you "apparently" loved? Everyone tells me that everything happens for a reason...what the hell was the reason? I would like to know. He couldnt even talk to me about it face to face. After 2 years all I get is one freaking phone call and thats it, I never hear from him again. I feel like a fool. I should have known this would happen, I should have known he would do this. Do I not deserve a real explanation? Do I not deserve that? Instead I get a bunch of BS about how he needs to be on his own. Well, i gave you exactly what you wanted, I just hope you can live with yourself. I could never do this to someone I loved, NEVER. So maybe he never really loved me, ill probably never know. Dont you men understand that us women just want to be let down easy in an appropriate way with a reasonable explanation? We need an explanation! I just hope you get everything you want in life, I really do. Im sorry that I wanted something good for my life and future and Im sorry I was working hard to make that a reality, but you didnt have to use that against me and make me feel guilty. You didnt have to take that happiness from me. You obviously have commitment issues, but I dont want to be alone for the rest of my life like you. Dont turn your issues into my issues, and you know deep down that you screwed up and that you got scared and couldnt commit. I honestly feel that for once in my life I did nothing to deserve this. I loved you with all of my heart and thats why this hurts so much. Just know, I will never be the same because of this.
http://broken-wings-28.livejournal.com/46569.html

wow, it has been forever since I have written in this thing. So, I have a bf now, his name is Cole. We have been going out for about a month and a half, and I guess things are going ok. He says that he loves me, but for some reason I still doubt him, I dont know why, but thats just what I do. We got in one big fight and ever since then I just feel like things have changed between us, I cant really put my finger on it, but he just seems more distant. I want us to be ok, but it just seems like something inside of me has burned out when it comes to him. I do love him and want to be with him, but at the same time I keep doubting that this is going to work. I dont know, i guess we will see that happens.
http://broken-wings-28.livejournal.com/46298.html

so i had to put one of my dogs to sleep a few weeks ago...let me tell you, it was one of the hardest things I have ever had to do in my life. Watching someone else walk away with your dog knowing that you will never see it alive again. It had cancer, but that doesnt stop the feeling that I had that I was killing him. I felt so guilty, i felt like a murderer. I just kept picturing his face, so pure so innocent....just staring back at me with those eyes. I cried the entire day. Do you think that wherever he is he forgives me?

So Joey left today to go back to New York, and im not quite sure how I feel. I think that more then anything my feelings were hurt. But i guess in the end I kind of expected it. Its kind of like I knew it all along, but its kind of like i didnt want to believe it or I just shrugged it off. Maybe in the end we were both with eachother for the same reason...it was convienient, but I think that I just put a little more heart into it. But thats the thing with me, i tend to put my heart into most everything that I do. I just put it out thereI guess I just wanted to believe that it was true and that he really did like me. All I know is that you cant go through life thinking that your some hot shot and use people, cause one day I promise that your going to wake up and life is going to surprise you. Its just one of those things that is inevitable. And maybe you will get past that moment, but life will always seem a little less "grand" to you. But then again life always has a way of making things seem a little less grand.
http://broken-wings-28.livejournal.com/45435.html

so my date went pretty well, we just went to dinner and then came back to my house and watched batman begins and then he had to leave at like 10 cause he had to work early in the morning. But he said he had a good time and that i was a "nice sweet girl". lol. I am hanging out with him again tonight, him and some of his friends and i think my sis are going to go down to to 4th ave. or university, im not sure yet, but its funny cause hes not 21 yet but he has a fake ID, hopefully it will work for him tonight. I like him though, hes really nice and he opens doors for me! lol, its been awhile since a guy has opened a door for me. So im really looking forward for tonight, i hope its fun. Elisa sent me a message on myspace saying that she was sorry about how things ended so shitty between us and that she would like it if we could hang out or go to dinner sometime. I told her that i guess we could, although i dont know if that was the best idea. i just dont want things to go back to the way that they were between us, i dont know if i really want to be friends again, but i guess we will see what happens. Well, off to go get ready for tonight!
http://broken-wings-28.livejournal.com/45145.html

so ive pretty much come to the conclusion that everybody has somebody but me. I just dont understand why everybody gets to meet this person that they fall in love with and that they cant get enough of, but here i am, a jerk magnet getting trampled on. Its not that ive totally given up on love, but its just so hard to stay positive when all you ever get is dissapointment.......im just so tired of being dissapointed, im tired of feeling like im never good enough and that i want to be somebody else with a different personality or a different face, because i think if I could be anyone but me I would not be treated the way that I am and I wouldn't have some huge stamp that says "pushover" on my forehead. Its just that so many people have dissapointed me lately and I cant help but wonder why. I know that human nature has something to do with it, but that cant be everything. I want to like who I am but when everybody around you constantly lets you down and the people that you care about walk alover you, you really begin to notice your flaws and compare yourself to other people, thinking if you could just be like them life would be bliss. I know that is an illusion, perfection really does not exist, but if perfection does not exist how are you supposed to find the person who is perfect for you and who thinks you are perfect for them? It just doesnt help when your old friends from highschool come over with their new husband and they cant stop touching eachother or smiling and you have nothing to show for yourself because your not seeing anyone. It just makes you feel a little more insignificant. And you think how did they do it? How did they meet them? What did they do? It cant just be luck, i refuse to believe that, it has to be something more. I find myself constantly looking for that, something I could have done differently or something I should do, but then i find myslef saying I just need to be me because there has to be someone out there who will love a shy girl who constantly doubts who she is and what she does because she has scars. And maybe shes not the smartest or prettiest girl in the world, but someone can still love and respect her right? That cant be asking too much. So i went to my dad's work BBQ and met this guy....he just started talking to me and hes so nice and hes cute, but of course there has to be some sort of catch...hes only here for the summer as a summer intern from cornell. Just my luck right? So we ended up talking the entire night and before he leaves he asks for my number, saying we could hang out again this summer. The BBQ was on saturday and now its monday and i cant stop thinking about him and i dont know why. He hasnt called me yet so im constantly worried that he wont, but i mean maybe he just believes in that whole waiting 3 days before you call thing, I dont know. But the is what if he does call and we hang out and then I end up falling for him? Hes only here until the end of the summer and then he goes back to new york? What am i supposed to do then? I really dont need someone else to miss....and I dont want to miss someone who lives on the other side of the united states cause im pretty damn sure i will end up never seeing them again. So then I tell myself, we'll just hang out and have fun and that will be it, we will just be friends. But i cant tell myself how im going to feel later on down the road, so i feel stuck. But i guess i just need to stop worrying and wait for him to call me first. Heres to more worrying until he does....
http://broken-wings-28.livejournal.com/44882.html

"We can rest contentedly in our sins and in our stupidities, and anyone who has watched gluttons shoveling down the most exquisite foods as if they did not know what they were eating will admit that we can ignore even pleasure. But pain insists upon being attended to. God whispers to us in our pleasures, speaks in our consciences, but shouts in our pains. It is his megaphone to rouse a deaf world." 
   
-C.S. Lewis
http://broken-wings-28.livejournal.com/43846.html

so i lost it the other night.....just completely lost it. I went to my ex bf's house because i had to give him something and i just sat down in the middle of his floor and started crying uncontrollably. Its just like the weight of the world and the weight of my life became too much. It was just the weight of people not caring.....not giving a shit about how they treat me or how i feel about anything. When someone says to you,"you are so pathetic you could make me sick" you tend to wonder why you are even really alive. Its just that people depend on me, they depend on me to show them a little bit of light in their dark worlds and i always find myself trying to save them, but really im tired of it, i cant be that happy person all the time even though I do a good job walking around with a smile on my face. Who is going to save me? I just always find people to drag me down and i somehow become a part of their complicated lives. All the little things just added up and i just felt like i was drowning and everyone kept pushing my head under, not letting me come up. But at the same time i thought, maybe it is better down here, where i dont have to breathe the ruined air that is the world, that is our lives. I dont want to let myself slip down there, i dont want to drown. I dont want to be like them, i just want to be the person that is inside me, the person that people see in me that is good. I wont go down with them, i just wont.

I hear it's nice in the summer, some snow would be nice...
Boston...where no one knows my name...

Boston- Augustana

We belong together, 
like the open seas and shores. 
wedded by the planet force, 
we've all been spoken for.


The hammer may strike, be dead on the ground. 
a net to my hand, a cross on his crown. 
we're done if, who we're undone, 
finished if who we are incomplete. 
as one we are everything, 
we are everything we need.

we belong together, 
like the open seas and shores, 
wedded by the planet force, 
we've all been spoken for

What good is a life, with noone to share, 
the light of the moon, the honor of a swear. 
we can try to live the way in which you speak, 
taste the milk of your mother earth's love, 
spread the word of consciencness you see, 
we are everything we need

We belong together, 
like the open seas and shores. 
wedded by the planet force, 
we've all been spoken for.

All this indecision, 
all this independent strength, 
still, we've got our hearts on safe, 
we've got our hearts on safe.

someday when you're lonley, 
sometime after all this bliss, 
somewhere lost in emptiness, 
I hope you find this gift... 
I hope you find this gift...
I hope you find this gift.

I dont get it....why do i feel so empty inside? I didnt think that you were supposed to feel this way when you supposedly love someone, but yet i still cant bring myself to say those words...but there is just this emptiness....and i dont know why i feel this way, i mean, im not supposed to,am i? For some reason its just so hard for me to say it....maybe because everytime that i have they end up leaving me. I want to be with him so bad, yet i still dont believe that he loves me and that he really wants me, and i dont know why i cant bring myself to believe him or myself about how i feel about him. I keep trying to convince myself that this is not love, but then i ask myself why do i cry over someone that i dont love? Why did i almost lose it when i thought i lost him that one day? Why is he always in my thoughts and dreams? Why is that when he kisses me i melt inside? Why do i feel an aching pain when im not with him or when i know i wont get to see him or talk to him? I keep wanting this to be love.....but maybe it already is, but for some reason i keep telling myself its not. Im just a mix of emotions, especially after last night. I couldnt help but feel that i was just another girl to him and that this was just another night in his life. I went home not knowing who i was to him and i hate that feeling. Im just going to let time solve this one and hope that i can bring myself to feel whatever it is im supposed to. I know things will work out the way they are supposed to, this i leave to fate.
http://broken-wings-28.livejournal.com/40903.html

I want it to be inconvenient; I want to sacrifice my life for it. I want the kind of love that wakes me up at 3am. I want love that hurts, love that I have to work for. I want love that tests me. I want the kind of love that is hard to find, and hard to keep and never easy. I want the kind of love where you get hurt. I want love that makes me cry. I want to hold on even if it takes me through my worst nightmare. But most of all I want the kind of love that's worth it.

I dont know what im going to do. How am i supposed to be with someone that i cant really be with? Its like im a little kid and ive been given a toy and i can see it and touch it and feel it, but i can only have it for a certain amount of time each day, and i can only play with it at the toy store, cant take it home with me, i have to leave it there, i cant have it whenever i want it.  And no matter how bad I want it it will never be truly mine. Do you know how hard that is? To have someone right in front of you but not be able to be with them because the world won't let you? The only reason i look forward to going to school is to see him, but thats the only place i can see him, its the only place im allowed to see him.  Sometimes life is just so unfair. Sometimes I just want to hate him, i want to hate him for even getting involved with me when he knew his situation, but deep down inside I cant hate him, i cant hate him for something that happened to him. And sometimes i want to hate him because he is so much like my ex, and that kinda scares me.  But the only thing that i am truly scared of is what i might do.

Close your eyes and I'll hold you here 
It's all right if you're feelin' scared 
It's just the sound of your aching heart 
You've hurt for so long inside the dark 
Now you can cry for the world out there 
Come inside and I'll kiss your tears 
It's still the sound tearing you apart 
Loving out loud with only half a heart 

I'll stay with you 
I'll stay with you 
I won't leave you alone 
I'll stay with you yes I want to 

Make your pain my own 
And if you need me all night or until I grow old 
No you don't have to ask me to 
I'm gonna take good care of you 
Yes I'm gonna stay with you 
I'll be right at your fingertips 
Hold on tight and we'll get through this 
Angels are calling from all around 
Lifting what's broken comforting what is bound 
Now you can rest in your time of need 
I am here when it's hard to breathe 
If you can't remember what is good anymore 
I will surrender and kick down heaven's door

A little boy asked his mother, "Why are you crying?"
"Because I'm a woman, " she told him.

"I don't understand, " he said.

His Mom just hugged him and said, "And you never will."

Later the little boy asked his father, "Why does mother seem to cry for no reason?"
"All women cry for no reason, " was all his dad could say.

The little boy grew up and became a man, still wondering why women cry.

Finally he put in a call to God. When God got on the phone, he asked, "God, why do women cry so easily?"

God said "When I made the woman she had to be special.I made her shoulders strong enough to carry the weight of the world, yet gentle enough to give comfort.

I gave her an inner strength to endure childbirth and the rejection that many times comes from her children.I gave her a hardness that allows her to keep going when everyone else gives up, and take care of her family through sickness and fatigue without complaining.

I gave her the sensitivity to love her children under any and all circumstances, even when her child has hurt her very badly.I gave her strength to carry her husband through his faults and fashioned her from his rib to protect her heart.

I gave her wisdom to know that a good husband never hurts his wife, but sometimes tests her strengths and her resolve to stand beside him unfalteringly. And finally, I gave her a tear to shed. This is hers exclusively to use whenever it is needed."

"You see my son, " said God, "the beauty of a woman is not in the clothes she wears, the figure that she carries, or the way she combs her hair.

The beauty of a woman must be seen in her eyes, because that is the doorway to her heart - the place where love resides.

so steve and i have been seeing quite alot of eachother, mostly at school, but i went into his work a few times and ate with him.  I surprised him once and he couldn't stop smiling, it made me feel so good to be able to make someone smile like that.  He told me that he doenst want anyone but me and he would wait for me, however long that takes.  The thing is hes 26, so hes done playing games in relationships, which is a good thing, but hes also alot older then me, so i dont know if im really ready to bukle down in a serious relationship and get rid of me "singleness" for good.  Im just so used to being single i dont even know if i remember how to be in a relationship or how to be a girlfriend for that matter.  I want to be in a relationship and then i don't because im not even 21 yet, and i still think i have alot of life to live, and i dont know if he will put up with me after im 21 cause i want to go out and have fun just like everyone else, so i dont want to hurt him in that respect, but i believe that if we are meant to be togehter then we will be togehter.  He is dealing with alot right now....alot of things happened to him in his past that he is still dealing with and they are things that i have to accept and in someways become a part of.  I dont know if i can deal with these things or not,  because its kind of asking alot of me, but i keep thinking that i have to give him a fair chance because there are things that happen to us in our lives that we cannot control, but we have to live with them and we want people to see the best in us and give us a fair chance based on who we are, not on what happened in the past.  I just know that if i was him i would want people to give me a fair chance, not be afraid of what they might have to accept or deal with.  I want to be there for him in every way that i can, especially since the death of his mother, who i found out is buried by my grandma, its a small world after all.  I believe i met him for a reason, and he seems to have it all figured out why he met me, but im just so afriad to fall in love again, im so afriad of being hurt again.  I know i cant let this fear stop me from feeling, but i dont know if i want to fall in love again.  I dont know if we will love eachother, but it could happen.  Well, who knows if things will work out or not, but im not giving up on this one quite yet and im definatly following my heart.

"The reason it hurts so much to separate is because our souls are connected. Maybe they always have been and will be. Maybe we've lived a thousand lives before this one and in each of them we,ve found each other. And maybe each time, we've been forced apart for the same reasons. That means that this goodbye is both a goodbye for the past ten thousand years and a prelude to what will come.
   When I look at you, I see your beauty and grace and know they have grown stronger with every life you have lived. And I know I have spent every life before this one searching for you. Not someone like you, but you, for your soul and mine must always come together. And then, for a reason neither of us understands, we've been forced to say goodbye.
   I would love to tell you that everything will work out for us, and I promise to do all I can to make sure it does. But if we never meet again and this is truly goodbye, I know we will see each other again in another life. We will find eachother again, and maybe the stars will have changed, and we will not only love each other in that time, but for all the times we've had before."
